SageTVPlugin.Name: Favorite Excluder (Anti-Favorites)
SageTVPlugin.Description: Allows the user to automatically mark Favorite and IR recordings as "Watched" and "DontLike" by defining special 'Anti-Favorites'. This is a port of flachbar's Favorite Excluder (Anti-Favorites) for the Default STV.
SageTVPlugin.Author: JREkiwi
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
2.8.4.2 Change download to GitHub 2.8.4.1 Change download to https
2.8.4 Change to prevent definition file being overwritten when more exclusions are added from more than one client
2.8.3 Changed time exclusion setting to not be a text field Added ability to add an exclusion to a specific favorite in the favorite's advanced options 2.8.2 Fix excluder definitions being cleared when the plugin was enabled but legacy settings had favorite excluder disabled and a new exclusion was added. 2.8.1 Fix background process not stopping when plugin disabled 2.8 Support new JAR to enable working on extenders etc. 2.7 Complete port of old Favorite Excluder import
